FuncDef: This command specifies the local ID of the router used for IDi or IDr for IKEv2 tunnels. The local-id can only be changed or removed when tunnel or gateway is shut down.
CLIs: local-id type { ipv4 | fqdn } [ value [ value ] ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the type of local ID payload, it could be ipv4 address/FQDN domain name/distinguish name of subject in X.509 certificate. Values-ipv4 - Use ipv4 as the local ID type, the default value is the local tunnel end-point address..
